title: Royal Air Force police dog training
creator_credit: British Films, William Weedon and William Hammond
brief_description: Dogs can be invaluable for guarding aeroplanes, supplies and prisoners, and realising this, the RAF set up a Police Dog Training Centre. This film shows each stage in the training of one of these dogs.
creator_credit_for_label: British Films, William Weedon and William Hammond
